title: Optical detection of uric acid based on a citric acid functionalized copper-doped biochar nanozyme
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33007-33018
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05976J, Paper

Noaman Khan, Mansoor Ahmad, Wei Sun, Noor S. Shah, Muhammad Asad, Mohibullah Shah, Riaz Ullah, Mohamed A. Ibrahim, Amir Badshah, Umar Nishan
Mechanistic representation of the sensing of uric acid through hydrogen peroxide with the catalytic assistance of the mimic enzyme (CA-Cu@BC). TMB acts as a chromogenic substrate and visually assists in monitoring the progress of the reaction.
